    • Constructor Detail

      • Builder

        public Builder​(int size,
               int offsetX,
               int offsetY,
               int width,
               int height)
        Create an animation builder for the sprite sheet.
        Parameters:
        size - the number of frames in the animation.
        offsetX - the x-coordinate offset for drawing the animation
        offsetY - the y-coordinate offset for drawing the animation
        width - the width used when drawing the animation
        height - the height used when drawing the animation
